title: gondel
author: gondel
content: Hi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.Anything new on the market which gives you coin for playing?Any new projects which you recommend and why?Thanks for the suggestions

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMHi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.It's full with grinders. TLM (alien worlds) is very bad now. Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMAnything new on the market which gives you coin for playing?Some things that may give you some rewards and you can play theseSandboxVulcan forgedAxie infinityWemixI think that you must also try to play non games based to earn like STEPN too. This may gives you some pennies if you are walking everyday. that's to make sure that if all of those things i have mentioned above didn't require any money except axie infinity.

comments.author: ThemePen
comments.body: This trend has gone down now. I think you should choose another one. Play to earn was on peak in previous days and this give a lot of earning opportunities to the users. But now it is going more down.Like in which you participated you can see the users are facing many problems. Choose wisely.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: There are many play to earn game and coin that will can take a look that will be very amazing just like some persons had mentioned. There are some coin that has play to earn project that is still growing and with time, we are going to get the full game. I just like new project with p2e games because they can have more bonus and rewards.

comments.author: gondel
comments.body: Quote from: shinratensei_ on November 21, 2022, 11:44:18 PMQuote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMHi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.It's full with grinders. This may gives you some pennies if you are walking everyday. that's to make sure that if all of those things i have mentioned above didn't require any money except axie infinity. Thanks for the share.I think STEPN you need to buy at least one pair of shoe to start earning.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMHi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.Anything new on the market which gives you coin for playing?Any new projects which you recommend and why?Thanks for the suggestions   -  There are only three known hit play-to-earn games and these are Sandbox, games under Wemix games, and Axie Infinity. But the two here like Axie and wemix games are no longer so noisy and trendy. Because if I compare it to the present, it's hard to make money right now, compared to last year when at least it was quite popular and you can tell if there is any profit.I don't know about Sandbox but I think until now it seems to be better than Axie and wemix, this is just my opinion.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: I was very interested for something like these a year or two ago. It seemed it was a big hit in the crypto market. The hype was theirs. But I think it wasn't really for those who are busy attending to a lot of things. I tried Axie Infinity but it was only for a short time. Now it seems most of them are not giving much earning anymore. But still I heard of some friends who are continuously playing P2E games despite the low rewards. Aside from Alien Worlds, I heard of Mining Network, Farming Tales, etc. I think they're all in the Wax blockchain.

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:56:53 PMQuote from: shinratensei_ on November 21, 2022, 11:44:18 PMQuote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMHi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.It's full with grinders. TLM (alien worlds) is very bad now. Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMAnything new on the market which gives you coin for playing?Some things that may give you some rewards and you can play theseSandboxVulcan forgedAxie infinityWemixI think that you must also try to play non games based to earn like STEPN too. This may gives you some pennies if you are walking everyday. that's to make sure that if all of those things i have mentioned above didn't require any money except axie infinity. Thanks for the share.I think STEPN you need to buy at least one pair of shoe to start earning.  Means you are looking for a game that is free and requires no investment? I can say that there will be no such project and those that are not invested, the rewards are very meager, not worth the time and effort we put in. P2E trends in my opinion have gone down and are almost no longer profitable, participating in them at this point is not a wise choice. If you want to earn free money in tough market times you can learn about testnet, retroactive.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: There's no such play to earn games, but you're invest your money to the project and hope the asset you bought will increase, not decrease. Let's say you need to invest $1,000 first and you can earn 500 token that worth for $0.01 at the moment, which mean you can earn $5 per day. You will need 200 days or 7 months in order to get back your initial investment. But after a month the token is only worth for $0.001 this will make you hard to get back your initial investment, then after 3 months the token price is only $0.0001 which make you impossible to get profit through games.Just try to learn new skills and offer it to fiver, you can find a real life job too.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Quote from: ThemePen on November 21, 2022, 11:53:04 PMThis trend has gone down now. I think you should choose another one. Play to earn was on peak in previous days and this give a lot of earning opportunities to the users. But now it is going more down.Like in which you participated you can see the users are facing many problems. Choose wisely.  It won't be the same with play to earn games in the near future.Most of these games are still in beta testing that's why the likes of Sandbox and Axie infinity are taking the lead but very soon it will change. If you can look deep into what some P2E projects are developing you will know that Axie and Sandbox won't stand a chance. PYR and ILV will do much better in future.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: ThemePen on November 21, 2022, 11:53:04 PMThis trend has gone down now. I think you should choose another one. Play to earn was on peak in previous days and this give a lot of earning opportunities to the users. But now it is going more down.Like in which you participated you can see the users are facing many problems. Choose wisely.  You can still earn some coins but the problem here is the numbers of time you need to consume playing the game before getting any reasonable amount price. They just not giving it for free because they also invested huge money in it. In other words, it's more like forcing you to play games rather than free to play because you will see the others upgrading their items and skills fast when using their own money for some upgrades and you will force to do so if you don't want to be left behind. If you want to earn, you need to invest at some point and the problem is when you get addicted and you cannot stop anymore.

comments.author: Gayong88
comments.body: I am not a fan of games, but this Game you can play and get Entice Games (Beta) has started on the official Entice Website. https://entice.dev/whitelist-game-users and here are cmc prices https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/entice-coin/

comments.author: Stella Mese
comments.body: I have also benefited a lot from playing the game play to earn and got a lot of coins. namely thetan games. when the price of the coin/token was still high, I managed to collect quite a few. but it wasn't long before the token price crashed. and I also switched to axie infinity but I'm bored. and the last game is on stepn. maybe I will also look for it again like you OP. but now the trend of play to earn has fallen. so it's a little difficult to find a real potential.

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on November 22, 2022, 07:16:11 AM...PYR and ILV will do much better in future. Can you give more details about your picks before we will do a hard DYOR? Did you invest in it? Are you playing it already? How's your experience? I read some suggesting Sandbox. Can you guys share some details and experience?I'll continue to watch this thread. I believe p2e will continue to grow and soon we will be able to see games that are economically sustainable. I still have my Axie pets but only because I do not have the time to check them 1 by 1 before selling them. My new p2e investments were League of Ancients and Synergy of Serra but they haven't launched their games yet and I am starting to doubt their potential.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Just last year, 2021, it can be said that the flow of play to earn was good and when 2022 came in, the income in play2earn games was a bit salty, think of the noisy axie that used to be, now it is no longer quiet.It means that the flow of income in play2ean is not good anymore in the crypto industry dude. If there is, it will be tortured like in sandbox and mir4 and others that play2earn that is the truth that is happening now.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMHi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.Anything new on the market which gives you coin for playing?Any new projects which you recommend and why?Thanks for the suggestions I think most of the NFT games that have been popular last year and bull run are still there. You can search for most of it and earn tokens from playing them.But the thing is that all of them have dropped in price and their value has decreased a lot. That means that it's market capitalization has also decreased too much. If someone recommends you with those, good luck if you've got plenty of time to play with them and you're just for accumulation of those tokens preparing for the next bull run.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:56:53 PMQuote from: shinratensei_ on November 21, 2022, 11:44:18 PMQuote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMHi all,I managed to participate in a lot of games in the past and earned lot of coins from games like Alien worlds.It's full with grinders. TLM (alien worlds) is very bad now. Quote from: gondel on November 21, 2022, 11:37:19 PMAnything new on the market which gives you coin for playing?Some things that may give you some rewards and you can play theseSandboxVulcan forgedAxie infinityWemixI think that you must also try to play non games based to earn like STEPN too. This may gives you some pennies if you are walking everyday. that's to make sure that if all of those things i have mentioned above didn't require any money except axie infinity. Thanks for the share.I think STEPN you need to buy at least one pair of shoe to start earning. No problem. Glad to help you a little bit but as far as i know that if there are two choices you can earn from stepn. The first thing if you must buy one pair of shoe to be able to earn from doing daily walking or running and the second way is if you can rent shoe from the market. The income might be different with when you have owned one pair of shoe to earning in the stepn. That's why renting may be better to earn free money from only walking everyday

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Play to earn games hype is now depleted and it's hard to recommend games that can make you actually earn a decent amount of profits over your efforts. There are many play to earn games such as Axie Origins and other games that will reward you their token but the value of it is not that much. I believe that play to earn games will have a trend again but in our current situation, It's pretty impossible to have a hype game right now. Maybe before the next bull run, The quality triple A NFT games will create a new trend in the market and will have more sustainable economy unlike the earlier sh*tty rushed NFT games which are bound to doom.

comments.author: irhact
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on November 22, 2022, 11:57:14 AMBut the thing is that all of them have dropped in price and their value has decreased a lot. That means that it's market capitalization has also decreased too much. If someone recommends you with those, good luck if you've got plenty of time to play with them and you're just for accumulation of those tokens preparing for the next bull run.I don't think it'll be wise to accumulate those tokens as they're basically dead, many of this tokens only got to te price they reached last bull market because of the hype that came to metaverse and play to earn projects. Most of the games were basically rubbish and not fun to play but only attract speculators that traded the tokens for gains and now they have dump them because there's no longer hype surrounding this projects. If you want to invest in play to earn project then wait for the bear market to end and watch which projects are getting the media attention as those are the ones that'll get hyped next and much gains can be made from them. Buying this current ones will be a mistake as most of them can never return to their all time highs.

comments.author: JunkieMiner
comments.body: I suggest you BinaryX game, which is the best play2earn game, I had already played it, it is computrized game, but it requires some techniques for making the squad. You can search it at YouTube, and I'm suggesting this, because they distribute weekly prizes through which most of the users earn a lot by playing it.
